ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://cbsig.chai.gatech.edu/CodeSystem/cbs-temp-code-system
CodeDisplayDefinition
Address-at-DiagnosisAddress at Diagnosis of Condition of InterestSubject's address at the time of the diagnosis for the condition of interest.
Usual-ResidenceAddress of Usual ResidenceSubject's location of usual residence. This is a broader location representation of the LOINC Code 77983-5 (https://loinc.org/77983-5/), 'Country of Usual Residence'. The meaning of 'usual residence' is defined as per surveillance programs.

description.value: Codes for Address.use which are used as slice discriminators to capture address history at relevant points in time to case surveillance.

display.value: Address at Diagnosis of Condition of Interest
